svg.text:
100 Experiments, True Effect = 5%
Experiment 1: ├────[●]────┤ ✓ Contains 5% Experiment 2: ├────[●]────┤ ✓ Contains 5% Experiment 3: ├─[●]─┤ ✗ Misses 5% Experiment 4: ├────[●]────┤ ✓ Contains 5% Experiment 5: ├─────[●]────┤ ✓ Contains 5% ... Experiment 95: ├────[●]────┤ ✓ Contains 5% Experiment 96: ├──[●]──┤ ✓ Contains 5% Experiment 97: ├─[●]─┤ ✗ Misses 5% Experiment 98: ├────[●]────┤ ✓ Contains 5% Experiment 99: ├────[●]────┤ ✓ Contains 5% Experiment 100: ├────[●]────┤ ✓ Contains 5%
0% 2% 4% 5% 6% 8% 10% ▲ True Effect
~95 out of 100 intervals contain the true effect ~5 out of 100 intervals miss (even with perfect methodology)
